SELECT DISTINCT t1.id, t1.name, t1.parent_id, t1.route_name, t1.route_path, t1.component, t1.icon, t1.sort, t1.visible, t1.redirect, t1.type, t1.always_show, t1.keep_alive, t1.params FROM sys_menu t1 INNER JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t1.id = t2.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_role t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id AND t3.status = 1 AND t3.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t1.type != '${@com.youlai.system.enums.MenuTypeEnum@BUTTON.getValue()}'
AND t3.code IN
#{roleCode}
AND 1 = 0
ORDER BY t1.sort
